name: Spinny Arrow
description:
Irritating and head-breaking game. This game gets your head mixed up and your eyes rotate in your head.
Try the toughest and most impossible game ever, nevertheless it is the most awesome game you've played.

This game contains a thousand volts and gets a smile in your mouth, are you ready to spin your eyes?

HILIGHTS
- Unique and original game
- Easy controls
- Irritating game
- Rewarding
- Innovative
- Simplified
- Beautiful

POWER UPS
- Door key (unlock locked gates)
- Freezer (stop quick your speed)
- Extra jump (make a safe jump)

ENDLESS RUN
Try to get far as you can go with one life. Spin and jump over walls and avoid poison lava and other obstacles.

LEVEL CHALLENGE
Try to solve over 200 different levels.

DAILY CHALLENGE
Unlimited daily challenges. Every day has new challenging track.

Now it's time to try something new!!!
